definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
to be capable of/to be able to/can
can only/obliged to do sth/to have no other choice
whether or not/can it or can't it/is it possible?

sentences.english: Still, who are we to say that we can stay?
sentences.chinese: 然而，誰有敢說我們能長留此地？

sentences.english: E. coli O157:H7 causes abdominal cramping, vomiting and a diarrheal illness, often with bloody stools.
sentences.chinese: H7能引起腹部絞痛，嘔吐和腹瀉，通常是血便。

sentences.english: He self-reflected and decided to decrease the stress and clean up his diet, looking beyond the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 他能自我反醒並決定減少壓力和調整飲食，改變現狀。

sentences.english: They climb walls, leap off buildings and spy on enemies.
sentences.chinese: 它們會爬牆，能跳下大樓，還能暗中監視敵人。

sentences.english: Meditation can help, and should be your first choice before medication.
sentences.chinese: 沉思能幫助你並應該是你就醫前的首選。

sentences.english: Can web vulnerability scanners help you remediate the vulnerability?
sentences.chinese: Web漏洞掃描器能幫助我們修補漏洞嗎？

sentences.english: I hope he can see the movie next time.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他下回能看這部影片。

sentences.english: Can you pick up London on the radio?
sentences.chinese: 你的收音機能收聽到倫敦的電臺嗎？

sentences.english: Change that arrangement and you can dramatically alter the resulting organism.
sentences.chinese: 改變這個排列你就能完全改變最後的生物體。

sentences.english: A number of investigators have used the fluorescent-antibody (FA) technique for Salmonella detection.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沙門氏菌檢測的熒光抗體技術爲能被廣範應用。

sentences.english: Can you please open an irrevocable documentary credit?
sentences.chinese: 能開一張不可撤消的跟單信用證嗎？

sentences.english: I think he thought, If Michael can do it, I can do it.
sentences.chinese: 我想他是覺得如果邁克爾能做到，他也能做到。

sentences.english: I think he thought, If Michael can do it, I can do it.
sentences.chinese: 我想他是覺得如果邁克爾能做到，他也能做到。

sentences.english: Also, we can finally turn the spotlights off.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我們也終於能關上那盞聚光燈了。

sentences.english: I hope to be available for the Coppa Italia match against Udinese. I remain confident.
sentences.chinese: 希望在意大利杯對陣烏迪內斯的比賽時我能復出吧。

sentences.english: In this semi-successional fermentation, a prolonged period of high rate daily gas production was maintained.
sentences.chinese: 半連續補料能維持較長時間的較高日產氣效率。

definition: to be capable of/to be able to/can
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
to want to/to feel like/to fancy/to care for sb/desirous of
